thread.section_title: Hotel Boutique At Grand Central - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cozy and quiet
thread.title_full: Cozy and quiet - Review of Hotel Boutique At Grand Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Emmaxp
title: Cozy and quiet
text:
Stayed here for a short business trip and loved it. The room was small, but very comfortable and surprisingly quiet to be so centrally located.
The water filing station in the hall was a great feature. I wish more hotels had this amenity.
The Italian steakhouse was delicious and the service was lovely.
I'll be back next month.
